I would be able to experience these events firsthand, gaining a deeper understanding of the context and significance of these moments in human history.

I would have the opportunity to converse with these figures, learn about their lives and ideas, and gain insight into the worlds they created.

Visit parallel universes: With the ability to teleport, I would be able to explore alternate realities, discovering new versions of ourselves and the world around us. I would learn about the differences and similarities between these parallel universes, and gain a deeper understanding of the multiverse and its mysteries.
